name: Project Ultra
description:
Project Ultra is an adventure game with a kind of humoristic game design/mechanics.

In this game, you will work as a physicist in a Norwegian reverse engineering program of alien technology.

This game contains references to UFOs and the cover-ups of extraterrestrial life, it will also contain in the future references to alternate/hidden history and even some cutscenes that show a story based on evidence collected from this subject as a whole. (check out my website, there's a list of planned features there https://www.crazy-dog.fi/en/pelit/)

This game isn't supposed to be any kind of so-called "disclosure" project, that's why there are humoristic elements in the game, it's an ongoing art project designed to arouse curiosity in people.

Main features:

  • Get a job in Area 15
  • Rob a pharmacy and sell drugs to aliens
  • Fly a flying saucer
  • Buy a car
  • Unlock new features and proceed in the story by shooting baskets at Area 15

The aim is to release an update with new features to gameplay every 2 months, bug fixes and small detail updates may occur more often.
All the main systems have been integrated, so I can now focus on building the story and sometimes make the game mechanics a little better.

Before this game comes out of Early Access the buildings and overall world design will be more detailed, the game mechanics will be fine-tuned and any known bugs will be fixed.
